description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. "Welcome to Iron Core 4 (IC4). Your space fleet is launching an all out attack against the enemy.Now play with up to 4 players locally. Your mission is to be the diversion. This is a suicide mission, last as long as you can to give your fleet the distraction needed to launch a surprise attack." Updated graphics and sounds! Overhauled and Evolved!!
description.short: "Welcome to Iron Core 4 (IC4). Your space fleet is launching an all out attack against the enemy.Now play with up to 4 players locally. Your mission is to be the diversion. This is a suicide mission, last as long as you can to give your fleet the distraction needed to launch a surprise attack." Updated graphics and sounds! Overhauled and Evolved!!
